title: Extern location does not exist when using RUSTFLAGS=-Zunpretty=hir,typed

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
If you clone the project [rustyClash](https://github.com/Lapz/rustyClash) and then run 

```bash 
$ RUSTFLAGS=-Zunpretty=hir,typed cargo run --example cards > foo.rs
```
compilation will error out,stating 
```rust
error: extern location for void does not exist: /Users/lenardpratt/Projects/Rust/rustyClash/target/debug/deps/libvoid-800c167cbb2d6be2.rlib

error[E0463]: can't find crate for `void`
  --> /Users/lenardpratt/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/unreachable-1.0.0/src/lib.rs:12:1
   |
12 | extern crate void;
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ can't find crate

error: aborting due to 2 previous errors

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0463`.
error: Could not compile `unreachable`.
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
error: extern location for cfg_if does not exist: /Users/lenardpratt/Projects/Rust/rustyClash/target/debug/deps/libcfg_if-68d1982b14cc1a4a.rlib

error[E0463]: can't find crate for `cfg_if`
   --> /Users/lenardpratt/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/log-0.4.6/src/lib.rs:287:1
    |
287 | extern crate cfg_if;
    | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ can't find crate

error: aborting due to 2 previous errors

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0463`.
error: Could not compile `log`.
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
error: extern location for cfg_if does not exist: /Users/lenardpratt/Projects/Rust/rustyClash/target/debug/deps/libcfg_if-68d1982b14cc1a4a.rlib

error[E0463]: can't find crate for `cfg_if`
  --> /Users/lenardpratt/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/crossbeam-utils-0.6.3/src/lib.rs:11:1
   |
11 | extern crate cfg_if;
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ can't find crate

error: aborting due to 2 previous errors

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0463`.
error: Could not compile `crossbeam-utils`.
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
error: build failed
```
If the supplied arguments to the RUSTFLAGS env variable is removed nothing errors out and compilation proceeds successfully.

**Edit**:
My rustc version is rustc 1.35.0-nightly (a9da8fc9c 2019-03-04)
